posts.title: hexo GitHub
posts.text: 经历了两天的折腾 顺利用hexo+githubpage搭建起了自己的博客 happying 🙃

posts.title: Init
posts.text: abcfadf1234567891011121314151617181920212223242526272829303132333435class LikeAnimationView: UIView { var titleLabel:UILabel! override init(frame: CGRect) { super.init(frame: frame) layer.cornerRadius = ([bounds.width,bounds.height].min() ?? 10)/2 layer.masksToBounds = true titleLabel = UILabel(frame: CGRect(origin: CGPoint.zero, size: frame.size)) titleLabel.backgroundColor = UIColor.randomColor titleLabel.textAlignment = .center titleLabel.text = "A" titleLabel.tintColor = .red titleLabel.textColor = .red addSubview(titleLabel) } required init?(coder aDecoder: NSCoder) { super.init(coder: aDecoder) } override var collisionBoundsType: UIDynamicItemCollisionBoundsType{ return .ellipse } override var collisionBoundingPath: UIBezierPath{ let path = UIBezierPath.init(arcCenter: self.center, radius: bounds.width/2, startAngle: 0, endAngle: CGFloat.pi*2, clockwise: false) return path } override func layoutSubviews() { super.layoutSubviews() LogLine() } /// 更新label角度 func updateLabelRotation(){ titleLabel.transform = CGAffineTransform.inverted(self.transform)() }} #由于渲染问题，请自行将 · 替换为 ` st=>start: 开始 e=>end: 结束 op=>operation: 我的操作 cond=>condition: 确认？ againcond=>condition: 再次确认？ st->op->cond cond(yes)->againcond cond(no)->e againcond(yes)->e againcond(no)->e{"scale":1,"line-width":2,"line-length":50,"text-margin":10,"font-size":12} var code = document.getElementById("flowchart-0-code").value; var options = JSON.parse(decodeURIComponent(document.getElementById("flowchart-0-options").value)); var diagram = flowchart.parse(code); diagram.drawSVG("flowchart-0", options);
